title: La Stupenda: a portrait of Dame Joan Sutherland
creator_credit: Derek Bailey, Brian Adams and Landseer Film and Television Productions
brief_description: A celebration of the life and career of Australia’s most famous opera star, Dame Joan Sutherland, culminating in her farewell performances in Sydney and London in 1990. Sutherland’s career spanned more than forty years. “La Stupenda” provides an overview of the highlights of her career.
